item.description:
This has been suggested by one of our members. So, lets give it a try! Listen to what he had to say...

"Lets get together here for a dinner this summer. Jack And Margaret Bucio are the owners, I like the $13 steak. All meals are served with home made popovers".

Sounds yummy, right? Let's check it out and break bread together...enjoy great company and laughter!

Jack And Margaret Bucio, owners of Suffield Pizza, have expanded their horizons!! Come check out the awesome menu, cozy atmosphere with fire place and enjoy a drink or cappaccino with friends...

Check out their all new menu on...
http://www.facebook.c...
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Terri or meetup...look for the meetup sign....

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Let's Get Together...Suffield Tavern in Suffield...
